The West is the epitome of human civilization IMO, but that happened *in spite* of Christianity, not because of it. Your romantic illusions about historical Christianity are not based in fact. ANY Christian nation from 1,000 years ago wouldn't have been any nicer than Iran or Saudi Arabia today, actually probably much worse.Â
I'm not anti-Christian or pro-Islam (a fairy tale is a fairy tale), I just don't think it's useful to reinvent history.
